query.text:
TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| project IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp, Temperature, _temp_high_alarm, _temp_low_alarm,
 HighAlarm = iif(Temperature>_temp_high_alarm,true,false)
| render timechart with (ysplit = panels)

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| summarize arg_max(Timestamp,*)
| project Timestamp, TemperatureAlarm = iff(Temperature>_temp_high_alarm,"High Temperature", iff(Temperature<_temp_low_alarm, "Low Temperature", "Normal Temperature")), Temperature

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| render timechart with (ysplit = panels)

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| order by Timestamp
| extend Status=iff(Contact== "true", "Open", "Close")
| project  IotHubDeviceId,Timestamp,Status

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| render timechart with (ysplit = panels)

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| render timechart with (ysplit = panels)

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| render timechart

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| order by Timestamp desc 
| extend StatusA0=iff(Button_A0== "true", "Open", "Close")
| extend StatusAI=iff(Button_AI== "true", "Open", "Close")
| extend StatusB0=iff(Button_B0== "true", "Open", "Close")
| extend StatusBI=iff(Button_BI== "true", "Open", "Close")
| project IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp, StatusA0,StatusAI,StatusB0,StatusBI

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(Contact==true, "Open", "Close")

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| extend Status=iff(Contact== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(Button_A0==true, "Open", "Close"), Button_A0

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(Button_AI==true, "Open", "Close")

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(Button_B0==true, "Open", "Close")

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(Button_BI==true, "Open", "Close")

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| summarize arg_max(Timestamp,*)
| project Humidity, HumidityAlarm = iff(Humidity>_humity_high_alarm,"High Humidity", iff(Humidity<_humidity_low_alarm, "Low Humity", "Normal Humidity"))

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = iff(MagnetContact==true, "Open", "Close")

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| render timechart with (ysplit = panels)

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series data = avg(Temperature) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step 10m
| extend stat=series_stats_dynamic(data)
| project min=stat.min, max=stat.max, avg=stat.avg, variance=stat.variance
| evaluate narrow()

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series data = avg(Humidity) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step 10m
| extend stat=series_stats_dynamic(data)
| project min=stat.min, max=stat.max, avg=stat.avg, variance=stat.variance
| evaluate narrow()

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series Temp = case( ['_operator']== 'avg', avg(Temperature), ['_operator']=='max', max(Temperature),  ['_operator']== 'min', min(Temperature), max(Humidity))  default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series Humidity = case( ['_operator']== 'avg', avg(Humidity), ['_operator']=='max', max(Humidity),  ['_operator']== 'min', min(Humidity), max(Temperature))  default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step  case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series tempAvarage = avg(Temperature) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(tempAvarage, anomaly)
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies, title='Anomalies')

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series humidity = avg(Humidity) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(humidity,anomaly)
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies, title='Anomalies')

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series tempAvarage = avg(Temperature) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend  series_fit_2lines(tempAvarage)
| project tempAvarage, Timestamp, trend = series_fit_2lines_tempAvarage_line_fit

TempHumDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId) or isempty(_deviceId )
| make-series humAvarage = avg(Humidity) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend  series_fit_2lines(humAvarage)
| project humAvarage, Timestamp, trend = series_fit_2lines_humAvarage_line_fit

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| make-series  ClosureCount=countif(Contact=="false") default=0  , ApertureCount = countif(Contact=="true") default=0   on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| make-series ButtonA0_Open = countif(Button_A0=="true") default=0, ButtonA0_Close=countif(Button_A0=="false") default=0   on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| extend Status=iff(Contact== "true", 1, 0)

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| make-series tempAvarage = avg(Temperature) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(tempAvarage,anomaly)

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| make-series illAvarage = avg(Illumination) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(illAvarage, anomaly)

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| make-series accx = avg(Acceleration_X + Acceleration_Y + Acceleration_Z) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomaliesX = series_decompose_anomalies(accx, anomaly)
|project Timestamp, accx, anomaliesX

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| extend Status=iff(Button_A0== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| extend Status=iff(Button_AI== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| extend Status=iff(Button_A0== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| extend Status=iff(Button_BI== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| extend Status=iff(MagnetContact== "true", "Open", "Close")
| summarize  count() by Status

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| make-series ButtonAI_Open = countif(Button_AI=="true") default=0, ButtonAI_Close=countif(Button_AI=="false") default=0  on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| make-series ButtonB0_Open = countif(Button_B0=="true") default=0, ButtonB0_Close=countif(Button_B0=="false") default=0  on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| make-series ButtonBI_Open = countif(Button_BI=="true") default=0, ButtonBI_Close=countif(Button_BI=="false") default=0  on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d) by Location

let openMax = case(['_openMax'] == "5m", 5m, ['_openMax'] == "20m", 20m, 1h);
MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_magnContact) or isempty(_deviceId_magnContact )
| top 1 by Timestamp
| extend period =  datetime(now) - Timestamp
| project statusOpen = iff( Contact == true and period> openMax, "Alarm Open!!!", iff(Contact == false and period> openMax, "Alarm Close!!!", "Off"))

let openMax = case(['_openMax'] == "5m", 5m, ['_openMax'] == "20m", 20m, 1h);
SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| extend period =  datetime(now) - Timestamp
| project statusOpen = iff( Button_A0 == true and period> openMax, "Alarm Open!!!", iff(Button_A0 == false and period> openMax, "Alarm Close!!!", "Off"))

let openMax = case(['_openMax'] == "5m", 5m, ['_openMax'] == "20m", 20m, 1h);
SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| extend period =  datetime(now) - Timestamp
| project statusOpen = iff( Button_AI == true and period> openMax, "Alarm Open!!!", iff(Button_AI == false and period> openMax, "Alarm Close!!!", "Off"))

let openMax = case(['_openMax'] == "5m", 5m, ['_openMax'] == "20m", 20m, 1h);
SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| extend period =  datetime(now) - Timestamp
| project statusOpen = iff( Button_B0 == true and period> openMax, "Alarm Open!!!", iff(Button_B0 == false and period> openMax, "Alarm Close!!!", "Off"))

let openMax = case(['_openMax'] == "5m", 5m, ['_openMax'] == "20m", 20m, 1h);
SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  ==  ['_deviceId_switch']
| top 1 by Timestamp
| extend period =  datetime(now) - Timestamp
| project statusOpen = iff( Button_BI == true and period> openMax, "Alarm Open!!!", iff(Button_BI == false and period> openMax, "Alarm Close!!!", "Off"))

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| extend Status=iff(Button_A0== "true", 1, 0)

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| extend Status=iff(Button_AI== "true", 1, 0)

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| extend Status=iff(Button_B0== "true", 1, 0)

SwitchDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_switch) or isempty(_deviceId_switch )
| extend Status=iff(Button_BI== "true", 1, 0)

MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| top 1 by Timestamp
| project status = case(AccelerationStatus==0, "Normal", AccelerationStatus==1, "Warning", AccelerationStatus==2, "Crash", "not parsed"), AccelerationStatus

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MultySensorDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| where IotHubDeviceId  in (_deviceId_multisensor) or isempty(_deviceId_multisensor )
| make-series humAvarage = avg(Humidity) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(humAvarage,anomaly)

MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| order by  IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp asc
| serialize 
| partition hint.strategy=native by IotHubDeviceId
(
extend timedeltaon = iff( prev(Contact) == true, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeon = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaon), prev(Contact)==false)
| extend totimespan(timeon)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0))
| extend timedeltaoff = iff( prev(Contact) == false, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeoff = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaoff), prev(Contact)==true)
| extend totimespan(timeoff)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0))
| extend totaltimeoff = iff(Contact == true and prev(Contact) == false, timeoff, timespan(0))
)
| where totaltimeon > timespan(0) or totaltimeoff > timespan(0)
| project IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp, timeClosed=totaltimeoff/1m, timeOpen=totaltimeon/1m

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| order by  IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp asc
| serialize 
| partition hint.strategy=native by IotHubDeviceId
(
extend timedeltaon = iff( prev(Contact) == true, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeon = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaon), prev(Contact)==false)
| extend totimespan(timeon)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0))
| extend timedeltaoff = iff( prev(Contact) == false, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeoff = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaoff), prev(Contact)==true)
| extend totimespan(timeoff)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0)) /1m
| extend totaltimeoff = iff(Contact == true and prev(Contact) == false, timeoff, timespan(0))  /1m
)
| make-series timeOpen = sum(totaltimeon) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(timeOpen,anomaly)

let anomaly = toreal(['_anomalies']);
MagneticContactDevice
| where Timestamp  between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime'])
| order by  IotHubDeviceId, Timestamp asc
| serialize 
| partition hint.strategy=native by IotHubDeviceId
(
extend timedeltaon = iff( prev(Contact) == true, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeon = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaon), prev(Contact)==false)
| extend totimespan(timeon)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0))
| extend timedeltaoff = iff( prev(Contact) == false, Timestamp - prev(Timestamp), timespan(0))
| extend timeoff = row_cumsum(tolong(timedeltaoff), prev(Contact)==true)
| extend totimespan(timeoff)
| extend totaltimeon = iff(Contact == false and prev(Contact) == true, timeon, timespan(0)) /1m
| extend totaltimeoff = iff(Contact == true and prev(Contact) == false, timeoff, timespan(0))/1m
)
| make-series timeClose = sum(totaltimeoff) default=0 on Timestamp from ['_startTime'] to ['_endTime'] step case( ['_step'] == '5m', 5m, ['_step'] == '10m', 10m, ['_step'] == '30m', 30m, ['_step'] == '1h', 1h, 1d)
| extend anomalies = series_decompose_anomalies(timeClose,anomaly)

TempHumDevice 
| distinct  IotHubDeviceId

SwitchDevice 
| distinct  IotHubDeviceId

MagneticContactDevice 
| distinct  IotHubDeviceId

MultySensorDevice 
| distinct  IotHubDeviceId
